name: Tommaso Digre
title: Furniture Designer & Restorer
bio: Designer with extensive experience in industrial, furniture, and interior design. For the past 3 years, I've focused on furniture restoration specializing in Scandinavian, mid-century, and modern design pieces. My design background helps me select the right materials and aesthetics, while my restoration work has given me valuable woodworking skills and knowledge of furniture construction techniques.

experience.description: Restored and repurposed Scandinavian, mid-century, and modern design furniture pieces. Bought, restored, and sold unique pieces with a focus on quality craftsmanship and design integrity.
Designed layout, kitchen & bathroom spaces, and furniture pieces. Selected furniture, paint, and curtains for private apartment projects.
Designed a men's jewellery line for the Vincero Collective brand.
Designed water tanks, road barriers, and outdoor furniture.

education.institution: Oslo School of Architecture and Design (AHO)
